title: Lagging very badly after patch and update
body: After the most recent patch and the Windows 10 update, i noticed that my client is very laggy. Up to the login screen is fine but once I get into the pregame screen everything starts to lag and the response becomes really slow. It takes around 2 seconds for the game to respond to my actions. It also makes my whole computer process slow. My taskbar also keep flickering. I tried turning of the Xbox record option in settings and it still doesn't work. Can someone help me ?

replies.body: It's hard to say if you're experiencing fps issues or lag spikes based on the description provided here.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) for these matches to help rule out possibilities, and find out if you're having connection issues like packet loss.  Let me know what you find!
I have the same problem, Fps capped at 60 even though its at uncapped, before Windows 10 update 150+fps
